CustomField.description: If checked (true), the prices in this pricebook already include VAT. If unchecked (false), prices are excluding VAT and VAT will be added by Reepay/Frisbii. Denmark/Sweden = true (prices incl. VAT), Ireland = false (prices excl. VAT).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check if prices in this pricebook include VAT. Uncheck for markets where prices are shown excluding VAT (e.g., Ireland).
CustomField.label: Amount Includes VAT
